title: Update on Office Shuttle Service
content:
Dear Staff,

We would like to inform you about an update to the office shuttle service that many employees use for commuting. Beginning next Monday, the morning shuttle schedule will be adjusted to better accommodate staff members who arrive earlier than 9:00 a.m.

The first shuttle will now depart from Central Station at 7:10 a.m., followed by additional departures every 20 minutes until 8:50 a.m. The afternoon return service will remain unchanged, with shuttles leaving the office at 5:15 p.m., 5:45 p.m., and 6:15 p.m.

To board the shuttle, employees must present their company ID card to the driver. Please note that priority seating will be given to staff with mobility needs. We kindly ask everyone to follow the boarding instructions to ensure a smooth and safe ride for all passengers.

If you have any questions regarding the new schedule or experience issues with the shuttle service, please contact the Transportation Support Team at transport@commutehelp.com.

Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.
